game.name: Monstrobus Quiz
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Monstrobus Quiz is an online trivia game for 2-16 players! Answer questions and use tricks or boosts on yourself or others. Create custom question packs to keep each game session unique. Gather your friends and dive into the Monstrobus Quiz fun!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Monstrobus Quiz is an online trivia game for 2-16 players! Answer questions and use tricks or boosts on yourself or others. Create custom question packs to keep each game session unique. Gather your friends and dive into the Monstrobus Quiz fun!
